jobTitle: Mid to Senior Level Employment Counsel (Seattle and SF Bay
jobDescription: • Prior top law firm and in-house experience; At least 6 years advising tech companies regarding domestic and international employment law;Strong command of WA and/or CA labor law.Ability to think strategically and creatively while providing practical counsel to HR and business.Have a passion for improvement.A dynamic personality with a “can-do” attitude;A JD from a top-tier law school and must be a member in good standing with the Washington and/or California State Bar (RHIC status is not accepted at this time).
